# Implementation Tasks: AI-Powered Content Generation & Optimization Tool - Phase 4

**Feature**: 1-ai-content-tool | **Date**: 2026-01-14 | **Plan**: [link to plan.md](./plan.md)

**Note**: This file is generated by `/sp.tasks` command from feature specification and implementation plan.

## Summary

Phase 4 implementation focuses on adding Analytics & Insights features to the AI-Powered Content Generation & Optimization Tool. This phase will implement content performance tracking, SEO effectiveness measurement, engagement analytics, and actionable insights generation. The system will provide users with data-driven feedback on how their content performs across different metrics and suggest optimization strategies based on analytical findings.

## Dependencies

- User Story 1 (Content Generation) must be completed
- User Story 2 (SEO Optimization) must be completed
- User Story 3 (Quality Review) must be completed
- User Story 4 (Ethics Safeguards) must be completed
- User Story 5 (Research Assistance) must be completed
- User Story 6 (Export & Workflow Management) must be completed

## Parallel Execution Examples

- Analytics service and insights service can be developed in parallel
- Analytics API routes and insights API routes can be developed in parallel
- Individual analytics metrics can be developed in parallel

## Implementation Strategy

**MVP Scope**: Start with basic content performance tracking and simple insights to validate the core concepts.

**Incremental Delivery**:
1. Basic analytics data models and storage
2. Simple performance tracking service
3. Basic insights generation
4. Advanced analytics and trend analysis
5. Personalized recommendations

**Success Criteria**:
- Users can track content performance with metrics within 2 seconds query time
- Users receive actionable insights based on performance data
- Analytics features maintain user privacy and data protection compliance
- All features maintain the ethical standards and user control principles defined in the constitution
